web_snippets: Amy Lokey is a transformational leader. I've witnessed the before and after of her impact on the large organization that is ServiceNow.
Amy Lokey leads the global Experience team at ServiceNow, overseeing Design, Research, Product Documentation, and Operations across all ServiceNow products and ...
Joining us today to talk about what's next for design is Amy Lokey, Chief Experience Officer for the enterprise software platform, ServiceNow.
